text: Ab Sabke Sapney Poore Hongey!  All-New Tata Ace Gold Petrol CX at just Rs. 3.99 lakh -  It's not just a new vehicle, it's the key to new avenues in business and life. With Hassle-free Technology, Low Maintenance. Fuel Efficiency, and Longevity, it opens up a new world of possibilities and fulfillment of dreams. In case you missed the launch of the revolutionary new Tata Ace Gold Petrol CX, catch all the excitement right here, right now. Watch the incredible story of a billion... fulfilled dreams from legendary leaders Mr Rajesh Kaul and Mr Vinay Pathak.  Own the All-new Tata Ace Gold Petrol CX at just Rs. 3.99 lakh. Enquire now: call 1800 209 7979 #ACEGoldPetrolCX #TataACE #AceGoldPetrol See more

अनेक सुविधाओं के साथ, टाटा मैजिक एक्सप्रेस एम्बुलेंस एक बेहतरीन एम्बुलेंस है जो मरीज़ों को जल्द अस्पताल पहुंचाने में बहुत काम आता है। एम्बुलेंस पर जीएसटी 28% से 12% हुआ - आज ही लाभ उठाएं।  #TataMotorsBS6Magic Know more: https://bit.ly/tatacvmagic
